About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

I am a remote front-end developer in Jerusalem,Israel. I am passionate about building web applications and working with IT. I have been working for a companies for almost 4 years answering support tickets, working as a NOC engineer, IT support, computer networking and storage , windows and linux operating systems. I am self-taught, and I decided to expand my skills where learnning about javascript, reactjs,sql java programming, I am also holding a bachalor degree in computer engineering as well as a certificates in android and web develoment,C#,linux, and also computer networking such as ccna and mcitp.While I spend much of my free time learning, I also regularly attend local tech meet ups.I started learning web development a few years ago. After graduating from jordan university of science, my brother and I started a restaurant business. But I decided to pursue my passion and that’s when I keep learning and joining tech aspects. I was in charge of the programming, and building web. I’m highly self-motivated and I have strong attention to detail. My goal is to build web applications with the best practices and latest technologies.
